derivation: a primitive root perhaps originally to intensify, i.e. treble; but apparently used only as denominative from H7969 (שָׁלוֹשׁ),
outline:
1. to do a third time, do three times, divide in three parts
    1. (Piel) to do a third time, divide into three parts
    2. (Pual) to be three years of age, be threefold
kjv_def: do the third time, (divide into, stay) three (days, -fold, parts, years old).
strongs_def: to be (causatively, make) triplicate (by restoration, in portions, strands, days or years)
